page.title: 01A typical school day 1985
page.content: A typical day at school starts with your arrival at about 08.30.Most of the time until 9.00 is spent watching or playing on the computer .Then at 9.00 we have assembly and sing one or two hymns.After assembly we either do maths or English.English is taken from the book Signposts to English and the maths comes from Ginn 360.Break is at 10.40.At 11 we come in and do maths, English, science or geography.In science or geography we usually do a project.At 12.00 we go for dinner. Dinner break is spent playing on the computer .We come in at 1.00.The afternoon is spent doing art,swimming or P.E. Art includes sketching painting or using felt tip pens.On Wednesday afternoon we go swimming.In P.E. we do catchball,athletics and football.In the last two years the school has won four sport trophies.
